title: Called by the Bear, Part 3
description: Carly Robichaux Cutler LeRoux? Stumbling on my biological mother was the last thing I expected when we came to Maine. And boy is this discovery a doozy, because my DNA gave me more than just blue eyes. But that’s the least of my worries. Sierra’s living a nightmare that could destroy more than her sanity.  Sierra Steele – werebear. I knew the transformation would be hell, but being bitten by the wrong guy brought evil along with it. Now I’m torn between the man who has my heart and the one who’s invaded my mind.
author: V. Vaughn
